error BlockOrder()
error Overflow()
error WrongAccess()
error WrongExponent()
error WrongLength()
error WrongParams()
error WrongSlot()
error ZeroGroup()
event GroupAccFeesUpdated(uint16 indexed groupIndex, uint256 currentBlock, uint64 accFeeLong, uint64 accFeeShort)
event GroupOiUpdated(uint16 indexed groupIndex, bool indexed long, bool indexed increase, uint112 amount, uint112 oiLong, uint112 oiShort)
event GroupUpdated(uint16 indexed groupIndex, uint32 feePerBlock, uint72 maxOi, uint48 feeExponent)
event PairAccFeesUpdated(uint256 indexed pairIndex, uint256 currentBlock, uint64 accFeeLong, uint64 accFeeShort)
event PairGroupUpdated(uint256 indexed pairIndex, uint16 indexed prevGroupIndex, uint16 indexed newGroupIndex)
event PairParamsUpdated(uint256 indexed pairIndex, uint16 indexed groupIndex, uint32 feePerBlock, uint48 feeExponent, uint72 maxOi)
event TradeActionHandled(address indexed trader, uint256 indexed pairIndex, uint256 index, bool open, bool long, uint256 positionSizeBaseAsset)
event TradeInitialAccFeesStored(address indexed trader, uint256 indexed pairIndex, uint256 index, uint64 initialPairAccFee, uint64 initialGroupAccFee)
function getCollateralPairMaxOi(uint256 pairIndex) view returns (uint256)
function getFundingFees(uint256 pairIndex) view returns (uint256 fundingFees, uint256 fundingRate)
function getPairMaxOi(uint256 pairIndex) view returns (uint256)
function getTradeFundingFee(tuple(address trader, uint256 pairIndex, uint256 index, bool long, uint256 collateral, uint256 leverage)) view returns (uint256)
function getTradeLiquidationPrice(tuple(address trader, uint256 pairIndex, uint256 index, uint256 openPrice, bool long, uint256 collateral, uint256 leverage)) view returns (uint256)
function handleTradeAction(address trader, uint256 pairIndex, uint256 index, uint256 positionSizeBaseAsset, bool open, bool long)
function withinMaxGroupOi(uint256 pairIndex, bool long, uint256 positionSizeBaseAsset) view returns (bool)
